FuncDef: The display b-vsi binding command displays the bindings between B-VSIs and I-VSIs.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a B-VSI.
If this parameter is not specified, all bindings between B-VSIs and I-VSIs will be displayed.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check the bindings between I-VSIs and B-VSIs in PBB VPLS, run the display b-vsi binding command.
Precautions
If the pbb binding b-vsi command has not been run to bind I-VSIs to B-VSIs, the display b-vsi binding command output will be blank.
